titleStmt.title: The true loves knot untyed, being the right path, whereby to advise princely virgins how to behave themselves by the example of the renowned princesse, the Lady Arabella, and the second son to the Lord Seymor, late Earl of Hartford. To the tune of Frogs Galliard.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "As I from Ireland did passe ..."
In two parts, printed side by side.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
